languages.text: "Они сказали, что не обязательно терпеть побои, сражаться за крохи пищи, гибнуть на живодерских работах! Что люди могут жить равно, достойно, заботясь друг о друге. Вот за что они борются. А вам выгодно держать нас в нищете! И вера у вас ложная! Разве хотел бы Император, чтобы его верующие страдали зазря?"

"They said that we no longer need to endure beatings, fight over crumbs of food, or die after you have worked us to the bone! That people can live as equals, take care of one another, and have dignity. This is what they are fighting for. You profit from keeping us in poverty, and your faith is false! Why would the Emperor want His believers to suffer in vain?"
languages.original_text: "Они сказали, что не обязательно терпеть побои, сражаться за крохи пищи, гибнуть на живодерских работах! Что люди могут жить равно, достойно, заботясь друг о друге. Вот за что они борются. А вам выгодно держать нас в нищете! И вера у вас ложная! Разве хотел бы Император, чтобы его верующие страдали зазря?"

That people can live as equals, take care of each other and have dignity. This is what they are fighting for. You profit from keeping us in poverty! And your faith is false! Why would the Emperor want his believers to suffer in vain?"

That people can live as equals, take care of one another, and have dignity. This is what they are fighting for. You profit from keeping us in poverty, and your faith is false! Why would the Emperor want His believers to suffer in vain?"

languages.text: «¡Dijeron que ya no teníamos que soportar las palizas, luchar por sobras de comida ni morir de agotamiento trabajando para ti! Que podíamos vivir como iguales, cuidar los unos de los otros y tener vidas dignas. Por eso están luchando. ¡Tú te beneficias de nuestra pobreza y nos impones tu fe falsa! ¿Por qué querría el Emperador que Sus súbditos sufrieran en vano?».
languages.original_text: "They said that we no longer need to endure beatings, fight over crumbs of food, or die after you have worked us to the bone! That people can live as equals, take care of one another, and have dignity. This is what they are fighting for. You profit from keeping us in poverty, and your faith is false! Why would the Emperor want His believers to suffer in vain?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Dijeron que ya no teníamos que soportar las palizas, luchar por sobras de comida ni morir de agotamiento trabajando para ti! Que podíamos vivir como iguales, cuidar los unos de los otros y tener vidas dignas. Por eso están luchando. ¡Tú te beneficias de nuestra pobreza y nos impones tu fe falsa! ¿Por qué querría el Emperador que Sus súbditos sufrieran en vano?».

languages.text: 「彼らは、私たちはもう暴行に耐えたり、食べ物の欠片をめぐって争ったり、骨の髄まで働かされて死ぬ必要はないと言った！人間は平等に生き、お互いに気を配り、尊厳を持つことができるって。それが戦う理由なんだと。あなたは私たちを貧乏にして利益を得ているわ。あなたの信仰は嘘よ！なぜ皇帝は信者たちが無駄に苦しむことを望むの？」
languages.original_text: "They said that we no longer need to endure beatings, fight over crumbs of food, or die after you have worked us to the bone! That people can live as equals, take care of one another, and have dignity. This is what they are fighting for. You profit from keeping us in poverty, and your faith is false! Why would the Emperor want His believers to suffer in vain?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは、私たちはもう暴行に耐えたり、食べ物の欠片をめぐって争ったり、骨の髄まで働かされて死ぬ必要はないと言った！人間は平等に生き、お互いに気を配り、尊厳を持つことができるって。それが戦う理由なんだと。あなたは私たちを貧乏にして利益を得ているわ。あなたの信仰は嘘よ！なぜ皇帝は信者たちが無駄に苦しむことを望むの？」

languages.text: “他们说我们不必再忍受殴打，不必再为了一丁点食物大打出手，也不必再辛辛苦苦劳累至死！所有人都可以过着平等的生活，互相照顾，有尊严地活着，这就是他们的斗争目标。你让我们过着困苦不堪的日子，剥削我们的利益！你的信仰是虚假的！帝皇怎么会让祂的信徒白白受苦呢？”
languages.original_text: "They said that we no longer need to endure beatings, fight over crumbs of food, or die after you have worked us to the bone! That people can live as equals, take care of one another, and have dignity. This is what they are fighting for. You profit from keeping us in poverty, and your faith is false! Why would the Emperor want His believers to suffer in vain?"

traits.locale_text: “他们说我们不必再忍受殴打，不必再为了一丁点食物大打出手，也不必再辛辛苦苦劳累至死！所有人都可以过着平等的生活，互相照顾，有尊严地活着，这就是他们的斗争目标。你让我们过着困苦不堪的日子，剥削我们的利益！你的信仰是虚假的！帝皇怎么会让祂的信徒白白受苦呢？”

languages.text: "Sie haben gesagt, wir müssen keine Prügel mehr erdulden, uns nicht mehr um Essensreste prügeln, uns nicht mehr für Euch zu Tode schuften! Dass Menschen als Ebenbürtige leben können, aufeinander achten und Würde besitzen. Dafür kämpfen sie. Ihr profitiert davon, dass Ihr uns arm haltet, und Euer Glaube ist falsch! Warum sollte der Imperator wollen, dass seine Gläubigen umsonst leiden?"
languages.original_text: "They said that we no longer need to endure beatings, fight over crumbs of food, or die after you have worked us to the bone! That people can live as equals, take care of one another, and have dignity. This is what they are fighting for. You profit from keeping us in poverty, and your faith is false! Why would the Emperor want His believers to suffer in vain?"

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben gesagt, wir müssen keine Prügel mehr erdulden, uns nicht mehr um Essensreste prügeln, uns nicht mehr für Euch zu Tode schuften! Dass Menschen als Ebenbürtige leben können, aufeinander achten und Würde besitzen. Dafür kämpfen sie. Ihr profitiert davon, dass Ihr uns arm haltet, und Euer Glaube ist falsch! Warum sollte der Imperator wollen, dass seine Gläubigen umsonst leiden?"

languages.text: « Ils nous ont dit qu'on avait plus à se faire tabasser, à se battre pour des miettes ou à mourir d'épuisement à force de travailler ! Qu'on peut tous vivre égaux, prendre soin les uns des autres et avoir de la dignité. C'est pour ça qu'ils se battent. Vous, vous n'avez aucun intérêt à nous sortir de la pauvreté, et en plus, votre foi est corrompue ! Pourquoi l'Empereur laisserait-il Ses fidèles souffrir en vain ? »
languages.original_text: "They said that we no longer need to endure beatings, fight over crumbs of food, or die after you have worked us to the bone! That people can live as equals, take care of one another, and have dignity. This is what they are fighting for. You profit from keeping us in poverty, and your faith is false! Why would the Emperor want His believers to suffer in vain?"

traits.locale_text: « Ils nous ont dit qu'on avait plus à se faire tabasser, à se battre pour des miettes ou à mourir d'épuisement à force de travailler ! Qu'on peut tous vivre égaux, prendre soin les uns des autres et avoir de la dignité. C'est pour ça qu'ils se battent. Vous, vous n'avez aucun intérêt à nous sortir de la pauvreté, et en plus, votre foi est corrompue ! Pourquoi l'Empereur laisserait-il Ses fidèles souffrir en vain ? »

languages.text: "Artık dayaklara tahammül etmek, yemek kırıntıları için dövüşmek ya da sizin için ölesiye çalışmak zorunda olmadığımızı söylediler! İnsanların eşitlik içinde yaşayabileceğini, birbirlerine yardımcı olabileceğini ve onurla yaşayabileceğini anlattılar. Bizi fakir bırakıp kâr ediyorsunuz, inancınız da sahte! İmparator neden kullarının boş yere acı çekmesini istesin ki?"
languages.original_text: "They said that we no longer need to endure beatings, fight over crumbs of food, or die after you have worked us to the bone! That people can live as equals, take care of one another, and have dignity. This is what they are fighting for. You profit from keeping us in poverty, and your faith is false! Why would the Emperor want His believers to suffer in vain?"
